text:
Jillian was an extraordinary host. The listing was just as it appeared and in a terrific part of town if you're into the East Village scene. Union Square is a short walk away and the apt is perfect for a weekend or month getaway.



Jillian was easy to communicate with and made my stay very painless.



Highly recommend Jillian's digs.
title: Chic 1 bed room in the East Village
